content.detailedDescription:
I was at the hottub in my condo at the far west end of flamingo road, located only a block from the loop. i had at that time a regular habit of going to the hottub every night at seven. i was engaged in conversation with two other people there talking about the troubles small business have, or somesuch. i sat on the edge of the hottub with my feet in the water and lay back. it's an outside hot tub with a great view of the sky and mountains. i'm looking up at the sky chit-chatting with these other two gentlemen when i saw what at first looked like two balloons, and said something like "small businesses should be exempt from certain taxes because what the hell is that?!"

he answered "i was about to ask you the same thing."

what the three of us saw were two brightly lit, completely silent, oval shaped objects moving in perfect unison. one slightly ahead and to the left of the other, moving as if they were attached. directly overhead. they were not a single object because we could see stars between them. they had come over the mountain and were moving across the valley towards the airbase. they seemed to be the size of largish airplanes. they were not blimps. we lost sight of them in a strange way, they appeared to become transparent the further they got from us. as we watched them, they got dimmer and dimmer until they were over the brightness of the strip and disappeared completely. the sighting lasted about ten minutes.

i checked my watch, which i used to make sure i wasn't at the hottub for too long, and thus know the exact time of the encounter.
content.summary: Two oval shapes moving in perfect unison

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a birthday party for my 88 year old grandmnother in san clemente with my whole family. my mother called me outside and pointed out the object. our whole family including grandma saw it. it was larger than a plane since a plane was in the sky at the time, object was around the same altitude as the cloud layer.  was square in shape and was flashing all different colors, and changing shape! it looked kind of like a rubics cube twisting. if light came out of all the squares on a rubics cube that was twisting in the sky thats what we saw.  i have never seen anything like this in my life, and i am pretty well self educated about aircraft. it moved away from our area until it looked like a star against the sky.  someone put a spot light up near the object so i know that lots of people probably saw this thing. my whole family saw it, and it was scary. please email me and let me know if there were other reports of this event. thanks- greg.
 ps im not a ufo enthusiast, before tonight i thought it was all bs.
content.summary: Rubix cube/large/changing color/shape

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed an glowing venus-like (but bigger) object slowing rising and eventually disappearing into the clouds.  this occured in the northeast sky from where i was walking through cheeseman park in the capitol hill area of denver.  initially, i thought it could be a low flying helicopter or plane catching the sun's reflection.  i was waiting for it to turn so i could identify it.  instead, it kept rising in a straight trajectory for maybe two minutes before it entered the clouds.  given the distance and altitude of the clouds, the object was probably much further away than i had originally thought.  it also means the object must have been quite large.  

during the time of the sighting, 2 fighter jets flew overhead at subsonic speeds. they were flying in a straight line probably within 10 miles of the object. within 5 minutes of the sighting, several high altitude planes flew over following the same general flight path taken by the fighter jets.

i do not know if this was some kind of test launch.  however, i saw no exhaust or any indication of how the object was propelled.  its direct trajectory and quick ascent ruled out the possibility of it being a ballon or lantern.  it would also be unusual to launch a uav on a beautiful sunday evening in denver.

i file this report in the hopes that others might have noticed the object and the shared information can shed light on what was haping in the denver skies this sept. 20.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing venus-like object rising into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just 14 years old at the time, the year 1967. i was riding shotgun with my mom driving and my little brother and sister in the back seat. we were driving in my mom's 1967 oldsmobile convertible, a very fine car. we had a summer house on the jersey shore in beach heaven which was a few hours drive from our trenton home. during this time the jersey pine lands were undeveloped and the drive was dark, remote and long, unlike what it is today. in a barren stretch of road we all see it in the sky. it was enormous, so large i could not see the ends, i saw just the belly of the craft. it was before us and mom pulled over to watch it. we all saw it, it was unbelievable. it was dead silent and floated barely above tree level and it did not make a sound. we huddled together. the crickets stopped whistling. one of it's lights focused on us and it stopped directly above us. i remember how it lit my moms skin, an unusual light not like florescent or incandescent or neon but more like todays led's except a thousand times more intense.

as fast as it came it was gone, with smaller crafts zipping around it, as we continued to the shore an excessive amount of military trucks passed us. we were right outside of fort dicks military base. what struck me was instead of the soldiers looking at us or at ground level they all looked up. we knew it was about what we saw.

this was before everyone had cellular phones and when we got to the shore house mom called dad who was still in trenton. she told him what we had seen and then came our realization of the time gap. over six hours had passed and we can account for only ninety minutes, that's the normal drive time.

my dad instructed us not to say anything to anybody and the secrete was kept until 2000. i was living in california and my brother called me home to new jersey to help care for our dieing mother. i brought it up asking her if she remembered and she did, every little detail exactly as i did, so did my brother and sister. my mother seemed relived to retell the story, but she asked me something strange, "did they hurt you?".

we all noticed that we all have the same scoop mark on our legs, and a patch where no hair grows on the other. i had medical problems and the doctor noticed scars in my organs from previous surgeries. not odd except for the fact that i never had any surgery.

the blue light appeared in my life several times over the years, once on the nj turnpike with fireballs, once in my hollywood home with a flickering man and witnessed by my partner and again camping in remote woods. i figured it to be saint elmo's fire until i realized it occurred too many times for me to witness that rare light so often.

today i am frail and sick with complications that can not be diagnosed. i believe my conditions to be related to that event.
content.summary: 1967 jersey pines family encounter

content.detailedDescription:
Three separate events within two to five minutes:
1.  apparent satellite moving from south to north - not registered on heavens above as a visible satellite.  very bright, magnitude -1 to -2.
2.  object at 45 degree angle above horizon moving from west horizon to east horizon in 1/2 sec, magnitude 1.
3.  second object same as #2 above, but about 100 miles north (about a thumbwidth above horizon with arm outstretched) again from west to east, same speed.
content.summary: Crossed entire sky in 1/2 second, twice

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping when in my room when i heard a huming sound and looked out the window and sae it. then suddenly i felt faint headed and the moon started changing colours and falshing vigirously and then i woke up 3 days later in my mom's house in misisipi having no idea how i had goten there. i felt so scared and confused and i relised that when ever i go near water i feel sick ven though before this incodent had happend i loved the water and also i have better hearing and vision now for some reson.
content.summary: The ufo was a teardrop blueish greenish hovering aircraft which made a huming sound

content.detailedDescription: I was just about to sit down in my backyard w/ a drink at 5pm.  before sitting down and drinking,  i looked to the northeast sky and saw a star-like object in the sky.  i watched it for a minute and it did not move.  i quickly got my binoculars to look at it but it was too far away to see any details.  since it remained in the same position, i went and got my camera.  i was able to take one picture of it.  after taking a picture, i lost sight of it and it disappeared.
content.summary: Star-like object in the northeast sky over philadelphia/bucks county

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog in an empty lot next to our apartment complex in cathedral city, ca  (next to palm springs) at about 9:50 p.M. on friday, sept. 19, 2008.

we live near an airport, and i looked up to see an airplane taking off of landing. as i continued to look at the night sky and the mountains in the horizon to my north (toward interstate 10 highway), i noticed, to my right, away from the airport and seemingly a much farther distance away, a very small dot of light, moving from the northwest to the southeast at a very high rate of speed, far too fast to be any kind of airplane.

i tracked its fast move across the horizon for a couple of seconds, but it was small to begin with, and began to fade from my view as it moved farther away. and it moved into an area bathed with light from a very bright moon.

it absolutely, positively was not an airplane. it was a very small dot of yellowish-whitish light. no airplane i've ever seen, even flying at the highest altitude, looks that small in the sky. and again, it was travelling much too fast to be an airplane.

size-wise, it looked about the size that a satellite appears when you spot one in a starry sky out in the country away from city lights. but whereas a satellite tracks slowly through the sky, this shot across it. it was also much lower in the night sky, just above the mountain range north of the i-10.

it occurs to me that it could be a meteorite, but it was not moving with any downward trajectory whatsoever. it was moving laterally.
content.summary: Watched small dot of light move laterally across horizon at very high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking at some strange clouds moving from left to right across the canal where i live. i thought they where unusual because they were in a line and they looked like small tornadoes. so i decided to photograph them. as i was taking the pictures i only saw the clouds and nothing else. 
 when i finished taking the pictures i went inside to put them on the computer . when i uploaded the pictures i noticed that some of the pictures had objects in them and some did not. at first i thought there was something wrong with the camera but it is working perfectly. as i look at the pictures i keep finding more objects by cropping and enlargeing.I am sending you the pictures as they were when i uploaded them to my computer. you will need to enlarge areas of the picture to find all the objects contained. but some objects are visible without enlargeing. please can you give me an opinion on the pictures as i really dont know what i am seeing in them. thank you.
content.shape: Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Disc,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular
content.summary: I saw nothing except the clouds i was photographing. discovered them when i put the pictures on my computer

content.detailedDescription: My first husband was in the army and we were living on post at ft. ord, california on rd. with our three children.  i was in my bed and saw 3 greys gliding in at the foot of my bed.  i sat up and shut my eyes thinking when i opened them, the aliens would be gone because i must have been seeing things.  i opened my eyes and they were still there and they looked like a sick light grey-green color, like they were made of powdered donuts that went bad, a cross between a lion and a praying mantis. at some time i went into the bathroom and saw lights shining in the hall.  i have trouble remembering or even making sense of things.  i didn't care.  i ran out of the house yelling something like "spacemen, martians, aliens...Ufo's did anybody see them?! i think some neighbors came out and i only heard one slightly negative comment like "quit drinking"  and i went out in the street (i lived on the corner) to see if there was anything in the sky.  it was dusky-dark.  a car drove up and a young lady told me they were the greys, that she and her husband had seen them and what did they look like to me.  "e.T.'s parents."  i used to think my children were okay, that they had slept through it, but one of my daughter's had nose bleeds growing up and one developed asthma and my son had an interesting reaction. i have developmental dryspaxia and he was slow in learning to talk.  he kept saying "a man!"  wondering if he had seen them, i went into the toy room, and picked up a rambo doll "a man like this?"  he shook his head no.  then reluctantly i picked up the little e.T. figure "a man like this?"  he shook his head yes and i felt flushed. it would take me some time to remember the young lady who came by my house.  she was the same girl that was on the other baking pan.  i had nightmares about it for years.  one memory i have is of seeing someone hold up what looked like a small strip of bacon fat that must have been taken from me because i was laying on a table. i have marks on the sides of my knees and ankles that are faint except when i am in the bathtub. the following year i we would be threatened over the phone by a "man in black" and when i called the police, i was put in a mental hospital and diagnosed with severe schizophrenia.  the medicine further confused me.  my husband and i divorced and my oldest daughter and i ended up on a bus from california to nc. my other daughter and son were taken to the island my ex was from and i haven't seen them since i went back out on the bus to try to get them.  i am on ssi for post traumatic stress disorder and my learning disorder was finally diagnosed, but i have never seen anything that one would associate with schizophrenia.  i figured it must have been a mild case or something associated with the illness.  i have never been committed since. the only medication i have to take is for anxiety and i have horrible sinuses. mm
content.summary: Greys

content.detailedDescription: The ufo flew over rockland lake towards my dads house. we where outside when we saw it it, was huage it flew right over my dads house like it was looking for something. then three helacoptors flew towards it the ufo stoped right over my das house then flashed like it went into warpspeed the three helacoptors flew away real fast. the next day the paper said it was the stleth,that was no stleth it was way to big like the length of a football feild. i was frozon i could not belive what i saw. two day later two men came to my das door saying they where fbi an wanted to know what we saw i said well the paper said it was the stleth right the two fbi said yes and left
content.summary: The ufo was diamond shape with red blue yellow lights under it

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were outside on an empty street and were just talking to each other. i wanted to look for a meteor so i looked up. i thought i saw one except it behaved strangely. it headed south for a few seconds before turning  abruptly to face almost northeast, a huge change in direction. it continued traveling northeast before disappearing. it was hard to see since it was moving so fast but it looked like a meteor or little star. in fact, i would of assumed it was a meteor if it weren't for the huge direction change. i dismissed what i saw at first and tried to think of how a meteor could change direction so quickly before realizing it could be a ufo. my friend didn't notice or care, and dismissed it entirely. i never suggested to him, though, that it was a ufo.
content.summary: Moved fast like a meteor but abruptly changes direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down on a lawn chair and looking at the stars fully awake, this thing flew along above me at something like 1000 feet or more. it circled above me 3 or 4 times, gaining altitude as it did until it disappeared out of site. it looked like a shoe heel from a man���s hard sole shoe. it had a rounded end and a squared end and it had 4 round dimples or impressions evenly spaced on the bottom in a square pattern. i could not tell how thick it was, i could only see the bottom and the leading round edge. it didn't look very thick. it wasn't really easy to see. it had no lights and a dull dark color the only thing making it visible was the ground lighting reflecting off of it. from my vantage point it was about 6 inches long from rounded end to the square end and 5 inches across the other way. it was oriented with the round end going first. speed, it covered about 1/4 of the sky in about 15 seconds. it was travelling west from lake ontario.
content.summary: Looked like a mans shoe heel

content.detailedDescription: It was a hot mild weathered day, the sun was out and there was a light breeze. i was in the barkyard of my house playing with my brother when i heard what sounded like a jet but higher pitched. at first i thought nothing of the sound but become curious as it became louder and louder untill it had drowned everything else out. i looked up to see what was making the noise and saw what looked like a metallic disc. i watched it fly  parallel to myself then make a shap turn and fly right over me, i then became very frightened, but my head down, and ran as fast as i could to my house. after i had retreated to my house i looked out the screen door to try and catch another glance but it had left. i how ever saw my brother was still playing and as if nothing had happened at all; when i asked him about the incident later that day he had no recognition of it at all.
content.summary: Ufo winnipeg

content.detailedDescription: We had just gone for dinner and we were heading back to my uncles house. we had stopped at a traffic light and i looked up to see if i could see the stars, and i saw the outline of a large triangle and looked closer and could see little lights on each of its corners and a large one in the middle. at first i thought it was an airplane but it wasn't moving and none of its lights were blinking. i watched it for a little while and it started moving a little and then it took off in an incredible speed i knew it wasn't an airplane then because no airplane could go from floating in the air like that to that kindof speed. when it took off it made a little streak of light behing it. i started freaking out and saying i just saw a ufo.
content.summary: Lights on each corner and one big one in the center

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen u.F.O s's on 3 different days.The first one i saw was flashing silver and black..I have photos of that event,of it being black then silver again.The second sighting was a mass sighting of between six in one photo and 30 or so in another but there was at least 50 60 of them.....They were like skipping across a pond moving around eachother then there were lines that would connect them,then they would blink out of existance and back again multip[le times untill we coulnt see them anymore....The last sighting i got a good photo,as good as i could get,of a u.F.O hovering then darted off to my left,back to the right,then straight at mt direction,poof it disapeared then reapeared above a tree in my neighbors yard.....All my photos have the time and datr right...The am is wrong it was pm when i got these..All of them...

   the first sighting i saw because a huge twin prop military plane fley over my house and it was loud...So naturaly i looked up at it and about 3 min after the plane left my sight i caught the ufo in the sky glowing silver and black....2 sightings was seen by me,melanie stone,my 5 year old daughter...And i got pics of these..This was the mass sighting day..The last ufo i saw off of my left,doing the samr thing as the first ufo,but this one was wobbling very fast,then it would stop.It went to my right,back to the left and flew my direction for a sec before disapearing and reapering behind my house over my neighbors tree.........It had grey matter comming from the bottom of it before it vanished before my eyes..I think i found a hotspot.I was in total awe of these objects.I see hellichopters and airplaines all day and night,ive never before seen anything like this before....Lookl at the times and dates on these photos..I have alot more photos.
content.summary: The ufo's all of them i saw through my bushnells.They are round with a wierd ring around them...Very bright glow radiates from them.

content.detailedDescription: While on a walk near my home, i heard the sound of a plane engine which caused me to look up, however, what i observed was too high and far away to be the source of the sound.It was in the west-north-west sky. the shape of the object was difficult to discern but it was moving very slowly and would grow dimmer and brighter. as i watched, two jet planes ( i do not know if they were commercial or military)approached the object, from the east, one seeminly "above" and the other "below" the object. at that point the object seemed to stop altogether for several seconds and there was also a private plane that was flying much lower, which i observed,also approaching from the east, which i guessed was the source of the plane engine noise i was hearing. as soon as all three planes were well past the object,it began to move toward the north and disappeared behind some tall trees. i remember trying to figure out what it might be and not coming up with anything that made sense.
content.summary: Very high up, alternating  dimming and brightening object

content.detailedDescription:
We wear watching a concert at lake las vegas and the band took a brake and i was waiting for my wife who was in a store i saw out of the corner of my eye the object ,and called her to hurry and come out and see what i was looking at ,well she missed it.What i saw a bright sphere flying out of the west at high altitude and speed descending to the east and slowing down it stopped, then dropped looked like straight down .
about 2 minutes i saw 2 nellis jets flying in that location and they flew a search pattern fallowed by 2 more jets and 1 helicopter .
content.summary: Sphere came in from west to east fast then slowed down then stoped then droped down

content.detailedDescription:
At around 10.15 pm. on september 19 2008.
my neberwood sitting on a chair outside looking at the sky say a strange
objet passing over him from north to south just about 1,500 feets west of the fort lauderdale airport west of i-95 crossing the landing and take off
way.
it was an triangular shape objet with white lights under and any noise was eard come from this thing from north going south heading for miami 

we never saw any plane north-south alway est-west or west est. 
i include a draw of it.
at 1.30 am i called tv chanel 7 news to see if somebody have report
something similar but they said no.
i did loose my time to call airport cause they will denied any thing anyway.
content.summary: Triangular ufo crossing near fort lauderdale airport from north to south west of i-95

content.detailedDescription: I heard something coming down from the sky outside of my house. it had a soothing hum the sound of it. it hovered over the front of my house, i didn't look outside the front of the house because i was scared. then it flew away. it was odd, i had a bump on the side of my head under my hair, and i don't know how i got it. i can't explain both of what i just told you at all. can you?
content.summary: I didn't see it, i heard it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at an apartment at the lorain overlook apartments on east erie ave in lorain.The apartment is on the bottom floor,so when i look out the window i'm at ground level.I had taken pictures out the back window(it faces the lake)the week before and got pictures of what i thought were orbs,so i started taking pictures again.I snapped a couple and looked at my camera(a kodak 6.2 mega pixals)and saw a light,so i kept snapping more pictures.I did not notice anything in the sky at the time,although maybe i was too busy taking pictures to notice.I took a total of 22 pictures in 7 minutes,from 7:35 to 7:41pm,and when i got home and put them on my computer i was totally astonished to see what i had pictures of! i guess i
 was in the right place at the right time! all the pictures seem to show the object coming closer to me then going out on the lake,coming back and speeding away as balls of green and purple light came from it.This was definately an amazing thing to have caught on film!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo over lake erie in lorain,ohio

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on our deck 8:30 in evening. had bi-noculars with me, i like to look at stars and i heard a small plane, stood up look to southwest at plane landing at airport about 1m to 1.5miles away.Now i'm looking at plane through bi-nocs as it turned you could see its blinking lights red & white running lights. i used to work at that airport refueling planes ect.. anyway behind the plane came a super bright white light out of the southwest heading straight over my house. it was low altitude a little higher than the small plane. thought it was another plane but no blinking lights. i was looking at it with bi-nocs it was spherical silvery shimmered no sound traveled northeast .As it went over head it appeared to slow a little then resume speed. then i marked time because this was not a plane. i was alone at the time but when my son came home from football game. i told him i seen a u.F.O. and he said i qoute ...Thats funny because during the game some people yelled look at that u.F.O... so i wasn't alone!! anyway the object continued its same path until it went out of sight..
content.summary: Came out of s.W. to n.E. low altitude. very bright white light .Object appeared silver in color observed through bi-noculars

content.detailedDescription: I was in high school at the time and i was with a friend out in goodyear to teach pop warner cheerleading. at that same time there were several pop warner football and cheer squads on the field practicing. it was strange because there was an empty field right next to us, and out of no where there were a bunch of lights. we noticed them, but they looked like street lights, except you couldn't see any poles holding them up. no one payed attention to it really until it started moving towards us. it finally made it to us, but i couldn't see what it looked like because it was so dark. it just looked like a black object, but almost like the color of the night sky, like it blended in or something. the ufo must have been 500 feet or more from one side to the other. i remember everyone looking up because it was so close to us. no one said anything, just looked. then i don't remember much except all of the sudden it had moved away into the distance. as it moved slowly, it all the sudden disappeared. after that everyone just went back to what they were doing like nothing had happened. i know it's late to report this sighting, but i saw your website on a report on yahoo. i have always wanted to report my sighting because it was so strange. no one believes me. i know that there were many sightings that night, and i don't know if anyone reported this one, but i just did. i think it was a very close sighting. it couldn't have been more than 100 feet above our heads. it made no sound. the next day they were saying that all the lights over phoenix were lights from luke airforce base, that they were testing some new airplanes. i don't believe it because i was there and saw it. i don't believe we have enough technology yet to create what i saw.
content.summary: It was large and round

content.detailedDescription:
At round 6:00 pm,in trenton, ohio, i had just walked out my front door, and was at the sidewalk, when i heard a noise, like a buzzing noise, i turned and looked up, and their, i saw this very big round silver ship, fly over the house, so i run inthe house, and got my brother, from the upstair, and we both look out the window, and this thing was moving so fast, it was just a little spot in the sky.
that night their where lights in the sky, and all these private planes were in the sky, try to go toward these lights, and when one would get close, the light would just go away, and when the plane past, the light would appear again, and again, this want on for hours.

check out ufo's in and round dayton, and middletown, ohio 1972-1973
100's saw them.

thank you
content.summary: Round, color light going round the bottom, flying low to the ground, going very, very fast

content.detailedDescription:
i was in a hotel on sunset and heard a strange noise outside. it sounded like an inner ear vibration humming sound.  i moved the curtain to look outside and saw what appeared to be a ufo.  it had landed and had had bright rectangular windows.  i was frightened and closed the curtain.  i then heard what sounded like radio waves probing the room.  i recall an electric current running through my finger tip.  i then oberved three aliens.  they were shiny like particles of energy and appeared to be smiling.  they stood together and had antenae on there heads.  i remember lying down and a light appearing over my midsection.  i could see myself being pulled out of my body.  i was miniturized and naked throwing punches as i was being taken out in a beam of light.  

  my feeling was that they did not want to harm me.  

i also saw a huge asteroid fly over los angeles.  you could hear and see it as it flew over at about 11pm, in 1999.  there was nothing in the news about a huge asteroid.
content.summary: Looked out window and saw a ufo with bright rectangular windows, saw aliens

content.detailedDescription:
Distance was hard to tell if these bals of lights where in earths atmosphere or light years away. i am assuming near the atmosphere. there was a series of lights in short event. weather was extremely clear, 1st fall like autum evening crisp and clear with no wind.

 ball of gold / copper light with glow sphere around it about the size of a dime if you held the dime up to the sky by hand. ball of light fade out and back on with in 1-2 seconds and moving in sequence to the left and diagnol down. movements to the left every 1-2 seconds, fade on/off all time. the 5th time i seen it go on it was behind a tree line on a moumtain top but i can still make out the glow beyond in the sticks. rapidly another ball of light appread far off to the right of wear the 1st ball started. then it multiplied 1x,3x,5x from it's center to both left and right each time on/off until all 5 balls of light vanished like someone turned off a switch. in the background of space i also noticied tiny rapidly moving stobes 2 or 3 moving like bees in the sky. just seemed like these objects could have been launching these lights in a  sequence.

 others in the local seen them also from nearby towns.
content.summary: Mystery balls of lights in western sky of white mountains,nh

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10:30 pm my husband called from his brother's house in a town about 10 miles away and said that he thinks he sees a ufo in the sky about 30 degrees up in the northeastern part of the sky about 20 degrees left of the moon.

i go out on our apartment deck that faces directly north and i see what looks like a plane.  while watching it, it pulses different colored lights.  to the nake eye it is blue, red and white.

i decide to try and look at it through my telescope.  the object is tracking straight up from its location so in order to keep it in the view finder i just have to move the scope up every 5 mins or so.  through the telescope i see rotating rainbow lights.  it is not a plane.  through scope i can't see the outline of the object, however there are rotating flashing lights that are moving in a clockwise circular direction.  i can tell that it is rotating because the flashing lights are all of the colors of the rainbow and they are moving from top to the right side to the bottom and then back up.  the lights seem to be rotating at a fairly fast speed, completing a cycle in about 3 seconds.

the object continues to move upward in the sky and right now it is 12:18 and it is still visable.  it has move to about 45 degrees in the sky.
content.summary: Object in the north east part of the sky that rotates color flashes in all colors of the rainbow in a clockwise rotation.  lasting several hours moving upward in the sky toward.

content.detailedDescription:
I was talking on the phone when outta the corner of my eye i see a lime green object streak across the sky then poof!!!Gone

this is the 3rd i have seen in 3 months
content.summary: Lime green flash

content.detailedDescription: I was in wal-mart dc parking lot getting into my car.  i felt suddenly heavy almost like i was paralyzed. i noticed a black slow low flying triangle almost directly above my head (i have a sun-roof).  the object had six white lights and all of them dimmed or grew bright at different times and speeds and not in any order.  at the time my car was not turned on and i had no music playing also my windows were open.  the object seemed to hover and not move for approx. 3-4 minutes.  it made absolutely no sound and i did not hear any engine or whirring noise as those from airplanes or helicopters etc.  i watched it and was tempted to leave but felt like it would see me and for some reason felt very scared and alone at that moment.  it suddenly made a sharp right turn without moving forward and flew off in front of me until i couldn't see it anymore.  it moved very fast almost like it was trying to get away from something.  i waited in the parking lot approx 2 mins. to try and gather my thoughts when i saw a police or ambulance helicopter flying in the same direction as which the object had gone.  perhaps they may have also seen it?  note:  i did not use my cell phne it didn't seem to be working it was turned on but seemed to be powered off.  i messed with my phone afterwards and hit a button and it lit right up.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black soundless triangle with 6 white lights that seemed to dim and grow bright separately at different paces flying at slow speed then suddenly made a sharp right turn and flew faster than any plane or aircraft i have ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a smoker but never smoke indoors and am outside frequently in the backyard. i was outside looking up at the stars (or lack of from being downtown san antonio and having a heavy haze tonight in addition to light pollution) and i noticed a star object that was traversing the sky. i was standing looking northeast which is the direction the object was heading. i did notsee any other objects in the sky at this time and presumed i was looking at a satelite or space station (i don't know if the space station is over texas tonight). being that most of the stars are not visible tonight from the haze, i was surprised that i could see a satelite. as i watched the object dissapear behind neighbors tree i then saw approximately 15-30 seconds later a similiar object, star like in appearance, high in the sky, etc., coming from the north heading south-southeast. there was also a jet in the sky which at first i thought was following the object but the paths diverged and the jet stayed on a course heading south-southwest. the jet did give me a perspective of height and brightness, and so i am safe to speculate that both objects where much higher than commercial jets. again i watched this object dissapear behind trees and wasunable to watch it any further. each object was in view for about a minute, traversing the night sky in this time. the speed was steady and the brightness did not seem to vary beyond what you would expect from atmosperhic distortion.

since each object was similiar in size and brightness, but at completely intersecting flight paths it is hard to image that satelites are that close to knocking into eachother as well as being on such different courses. 

i was not paniced nor excited, mostly curious and observant of what i was seeing.
content.summary: Two high altitude objects crisscrossing sky
